title: Beautiful Dress
lyrics:
When you're young
Must've left for the town
Darlin', when you part
You won't slow down
Didn't lay here lay beside me

In my mother's home

Hung like a pendant

My little heart of stone



Ooh, let me wear you like a beautiful dress

Let me love you

Let me wear you like a beautiful dress



Eyes open

Little milk on the tongue

Barely smiling

To see your silence stung



When you're near me

No love, more goodbyes

The hard thing about love

Is that it has to burn all the time



Come back!

Let me wear you like a beautiful dress

Let me love you

Let me wear you like a beautiful dress, yeah!



Let me wear you like a beautiful dress

Let me love you

Let me wear you like a beautiful dress, yeah!
